More

About Us

NoahGuard is a second generation structural security construction firm. Our background is extensive and provides the ultimate in security protection. From private residences to commercial and industrial applications, our firm is dedicated to both the safety and feasibility of each specific project undertaken.

Products

We specialize in Nuclear, Biological, Chemical and Civil Protection including Impervious Structures, Safe Rooms and Explosive Shelters. Our minimally invasive and discreet retrofits offer security and peace of mind for you and your family.
